name: Blocky Cars SIM 2018
description:
Blocky Cars Sim is the best simulation game to score points which has been designed from BigCode Free Games. It's the coolest multiplayer game with cute blocky cars with amazing speed. These cute tiny cars will drive you crazy in each unique task & many more surprises just waiting for you to unlock. It’s an endless easy mode for kids to play & one of the best simulation games for our loving crazy users. We have created the most imaginative multiplayer game & and don't miss any new updates from us! So, select your coolest blocky cars & race with your friends to score to get the highest ratings on your scoreboard. Enjoy driving!. Drive carefully in Blocky Cars Sim and don’t forget to take a rest to go as far as you can in Blocky Cars Sim 2018.

Gameplay: This game has 2 modes:-
You have to click on 2 buttons to move left and right respectively

Arcade Mode:-
*Arcade mode has a multiplayer zone where you can compete with your friends & score on the leaderboards.

Time Trial Mode:-
*Show your skill by driving through the tracks in the given time limit.

Install & Play the coolest simulation game Blocky Cars Sim 2018

Blocky Cars Sim 2018 Features:

*It’s a Free Simulation Game
*Unique missions to play
*Amazing voxel art
*Unlock 15+ cars to play
*Awesome driving controls
*Best addictive gameplay to score
*Best simulation gameplay ever played
*Many cars are available matching your style

If you love Blocky Cars Sim 2018, please do leave a comment.
